articles.title: Why Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey Opposes Abolishing Police : Live Updates: Protests For Racial Justice - NPR
articles.description: Jacob Frey acknowledges a need to shift a culture that has "failed black and brown people" for years. But he says calling for the dismantling of police without an alternative in place is "not a plan."
articles.content:
Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey speaks Saturday with demonstrators calling for the defunding of his city's police department.
Stephen Maturen/Getty Images
